name: Hindi Word Search Game
description:
Word search game is completely free, created to help kids, students and adults to learn Hindi words in a fun way.

It is also a brain game and very addictive to play.

How is our game unique?
★ Two game modes are available
★ Main game - 160 word categories with 1600+ unique words
★ Infinity game - Unlimited randomly generated word puzzles. It has 4600+ unique words
★ Simple and fast interface
★ You can use hints to reveal words that are difficult to find

How to play the Game?
Swipe your finger in any one of 8 directions ie. Left to Right, Right to Left, Top to Bottom, Bottom to Top and diagonally to find out 8 hidden words from the grid.
